summary: This conversation is between a customer (speaker_0) and a relationship manager (speaker_1) from the Namede Club platform, where the customer had made a previous investment of ₹1,000. The discussion revolves around the customer's understanding of the platform and the investment process.
customer_concerns: - The customer had some doubts about the reliability of the platform, as they were not fully familiar with it.
questions_asked: - The customer asked about the investment details, such as the duration of the investment and the interest/returns they can expect.
overall_sentiment: Neutral. The customer seemed to have some initial doubts but was open to understanding the platform better and potentially making further investments if satisfied.
